Original: 今日來貴店消費，感覺氣氛非常融洽與歡樂，而且整家店的感覺很溫馨，男女店員人都很專業，讓我有以後都想來這購買的意願，消費沒有壓力，購物體驗很舒服，是一間值得推薦的酒類專門店！

Original:

EN:
After receiving a member of the member's birthday, buying two free and one discount newsletter, the clerk twice twice "buy two get one free one is not very cost -effective", and I have always recommended me to other wines, but I refuse to give me a discount. There is no right to.

In the end, I was entangled for five minutes, I still didn't buy it for me, and put on a face of "forgive you is not a big family". Since it is so embarrassing, why should I launch this activity at the beginning?
